alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:04PM MDT until August 03 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL WELD AND EAST CENTRAL LARIMER COUNTIES... At 604 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Windsor, or 7 miles southeast of Fort Collins, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 554 PM MDT, a trained spotter reported quarter size hail just south of Fort Collins. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Severance, Greeley and Evans. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
